title: playground: does not produce the same results as installed go.
body:
See this playground:

https://play.golang.org/p/OtcBZ-HN8l

This text is correctly escaped when run from the playground. When running this code from within a standard test (using the testing package), only the last line within the string is returned.  This behavior has been observed on both Ubuntu 14.4 and Mac OS X when using Go 1.4.1.
